definition: Manchu/bannerman (refers to the eight Manchu banners 八旗[Ba1 qi2])
banner/flag/(in Qing times) Manchu (cf. 八旗[Ba1 qi2])/administrative subdivision in inner Mongolia equivalent to 縣|县[xian4] county/CL:面[mian4]

sentences.english: During these transitions, people of Baqi garrison community had melted into the local society.
sentences.chinese: 在這種變遷過程中，駐防旗人也深深地融入當地社會。

definition: Manchu household register (during the Qing Dynasty)

child of a Manchu bannerman family (nobility)/(fig.) privileged brat
